message: Let's start fair. I'll take the majority, but you get a good chunk to start.
I think this is a fair starting point, considering the money is going to depreciate for me each round. Let's start a negotiation.
Let's meet in the middle. I'm willing to give up some of my share, but I need a good amount to make it worth my while.
I'm willing to meet you halfway. This offer is closer to your last proposal but keeps things fair for both of us. Let's reach an agreement.
